content: **materials ** * 6 - 250 yd balls white or ecru or 8 - 175 yd balls colors * steel crochet hook no 9 or 10 in crochet treasures - you asked for thread - puritan star spangled mercerized crochet cotton article 40 11 balls silver spangle will make 4 mats 15 x 14 - puritan mercerized crochet cotton article 40 5 balls will make mats 14 5 x 11 5
